import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update a voicemail"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"patch"}
  path={"/api/v1/domains/{domain_uuid}/voicemails/{voicemail_uuid}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates an existing voicemail in the specified domain.

Access rules:
- Caller must have access to the target domain (domain scope).
- Caller must have the `voicemail_edit` permission.

Notes:
- Fields are optional. If a field is omitted, the current value is unchanged.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"domain_uuid","description":"The domain UUID.","example":"4018f7a3-8e0a-47bb-9f4f-04b1313e0e1b","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"in":"path","name":"voicemail_uuid","description":"The voicemail UUID.","example":"d2c7b17c-8b0d-4f0f-b5ff-2cfb6d7a4f4b","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":false,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"voicemail_id":{"type":"number","description":"Numeric voicemail box number. Must be unique within the domain.","example":1001},"voicemail_password":{"type":"number","description":"Voicemail PIN/password. If omitted, the current PIN is unchanged.","example":1001},"voicemail_mail_to":{"type":"string","description":"Email address for voicemail-to-email notifications. If omitted, the current value is unchanged. Use null to clear. Must be a valid email address. Must not be greater than 255 characters.","example":"frontdesk@example.com"},"voicemail_sms_to":{"type":"string","description":"Optional SMS destination for voicemail alerts. If omitted, unchanged. Use null to clear. Must not be greater than 255 characters.","example":"+12135551212"},"voicemail_transcription_enabled":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether voicemail transcription is enabled. If omitted, unchanged.","example":true},"voicemail_local_after_email":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether to keep voicemail local after emailing it. If omitted, unchanged.","example":true},"voicemail_tutorial":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether voicemail tutorial is enabled. If omitted, unchanged.","example":true},"voicemail_recording_instructions":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether voicemail recording instructions are enabled. If omitted, unchanged.","example":true},"voicemail_file":{"type":"string","description":"Voicemail delivery mode (e.g., attach). If omitted, unchanged. Must not be greater than 50 characters.","example":"attach"},"voicemail_description":{"type":"string","description":"Optional voicemail description/label. If omitted, unchanged. Use null to clear. Must not be greater than 255 characters.","example":"Front Desk Voicemail (updated)"},"greeting_id":{"type":"integer","description":"Greeting ID to use for this voicemail (if applicable). If omitted, unchanged. Use null to clear.","example":3},"voicemail_alternate_greet_id":{"type":"integer","description":"Alternate greeting ID (if applicable). If omitted, unchanged. Use null to clear.","example":200},"voicemail_enabled":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether voicemail is enabled. If omitted, unchanged.","example":true}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
